info.title: Ice cream market.
info.description: This project it's api to feed the ice cream market application service.

servers.description: If you run this project locally

post.description: Endpoint to add a new Cream to the system.

example.message: Unique constraint failed on the fields: name

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many creams to return per page

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter creams by some fields table
parameters.example: name:like:some text here,id:some id here,price:gt:1000,amount:lt:5,createdAt:egt:some date ISO

get.description: Retrieve a list of creams based on optional query parameters.

delete.description: Delete creams based on ids query parameter.

post.description: Authenticate and sign in a user.

user.name: Test User Admin to sign in test

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Cream to retrieve

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific Cream by its ID.

put.description: Endpoint to update a Cream to the system.

example.message: At least one property must exist in the request body

delete.description: Delete cream based on id path parameter.

post.description: Endpoint to add a new Topping to the system.

example.message: amount must be a number and not empty

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many toppings to return per page

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter toppings by some fields table
parameters.example: name:like:some text here,id:some id here,price:gt:1000,amount:lt:5,createdAt:egt:some date ISO

delete.description: Delete toppings based on ids query parameter.

parameters.name: id

post.description: Endpoint to add a new Product to the system.

example.message: price must be a float number and not empty

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: How many products to return per page

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter products by some fields table
parameters.example: name:like:some text here,id:some id here,price:gt:1000,amount:lt:5,createdAt:egt:some date ISO
